body_html:
I am also getting the same error regarding undefined reference to mkldnn library. I have installed mkldnn and added the location to the corresponding environment variables but I get the errors below:

.../pytorch/build/lib/libcaffe2.so: undefined reference to `mkldnn_memory_set_data_handle'

I also tried with the proposed solution of:

FULL_CAFFE2=1 USE_MKLDNN=1 python setup.py install

but that does not resolve the issue

body:
I am also getting the same error regarding undefined reference to mkldnn library. I have installed mkldnn and added the location to the corresponding environment variables but I get the errors below:

.../pytorch/build/lib/libcaffe2.so: undefined reference to `mkldnn_memory_set_data_handle'


I also tried with the proposed solution of:

FULL_CAFFE2=1 USE_MKLDNN=1 python setup.py install

but that does not resolve the issue
